title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Plane front solidification of single phase alloys, interface stability, Czochralski growth, growth of single crystals of high perfection, cellular solidification, cellular-dendritic transition, plane front solidification of polyphase alloys, macro- and micro-morphology of eutectic growth, growth of graphite in cast irons, some problems in solidification of polyphase alloys, inclusions - their formation and distribution; Rheocasting, thixocasting, electroslag casting, casting of composites.
